head.supplied: [In a second letter, ¶ M to the Société nationale d'acclimatation de France, April 1886 (in this edition as 86-04-00c). ¶ Mr Von Mueller announced that his ¶ Iconography of the Myoporinae ¶ ¶ woul...

div.p: To the Société nationale d'acclimatation de France

Letter not found. The text given here is from Bulletin de la Société nationale d'acclimatation de France, series 4, vol. 3, p. 401 (1886). The letter is dated to April as the latest likely date that it could have been sent to be reported at the meeting of 28 May 1886.
[Dans une seconde lettre, M. Von Mueller fait connaître que son Iconographie des Myoporinées paraîtra prochainement, et qu'il se fera un vrai plaisir d'en offrir un exemplaire à la Société.]

p.style: font-family: Geneva; margin-left: 0.3346in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: -0.3346in; font-size: 9pt;

note.p: M to the Société nationale d'acclimatation de France , April 1886 (in this edition as 86-04-00c).

p.seg: Mr Von Mueller announced that his

p.style: font-family: Geneva; margin-left: 0.3346in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: -0.3346in; font-size: 9pt;

note.p: B86.08.05. M’s recommended distribution list, which included a copy for the Society, was approved by the Chief Secretary on 9 September (see notes to M to A. Deakin, 27 August 1886).

p.seg: would be published shortly, and that it would be a real pleasure to offer a copy of it to the Society.]
